titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4174) to amend the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-746.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/30/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4174 (small business programs).
